resource_notes: Requires foundational GCP and Firebase project setup skills.
alternative_approach: A senior could complete this faster but is over-skilled for the task.
risk_factors: Incorrect API or billing configuration can cause downstream failures.
mitigation_strategy: Use a documented checklist for project setup.

resource_notes: Requires deep expertise in GCP IAM and security best practices.
alternative_approach: Using long-lived keys is faster but introduces significant security risk.
risk_factors: Misconfiguration can lead to a complete CI/CD pipeline failure or security breach.
mitigation_strategy: Pair programming with another senior engineer for review.

resource_notes: Requires expertise in atomic transactions and compensation logic for multi-service operations.
alternative_approach: A non-atomic implementation is faster but risks creating orphaned data.
risk_factors: Bug in rollback logic could lead to inconsistent user/tenant data (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Implement exhaustive unit tests covering all failure and rollback paths.

task_name: Implement Check-In Logic and Offline Caching
resource_notes: Requires strong understanding of Firestore's offline persistence.
alternative_approach: Using a separate local DB adds complexity but gives more control over offline data.
risk_factors: Inconsistent offline behavior across iOS/Android platforms.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory E2E testing on physical devices for offline scenarios.

resource_notes: Requires implementing a real-time Firestore query and managing state with Riverpod.
alternative_approach: Manual refresh instead of real-time stream is simpler but offers a poor UX.
risk_factors: Incorrect Firestore security rules could expose data from other teams (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategy: Write and automate security rule tests in the CI pipeline.
